languages.text: "Род Зауэрбэк. Ваш глава никогда не скрывал своего отношения к моей персоне — вполне достаточно для обвинения".
languages.translation_comment: хотя бы один из этих флагов или оба — ProvedWerserianInnocent и ZauerbackHatesYou

traits.locale_text: "Мне омерзительно видеть вашу физиономию, Махарий. Абеляр, огласи приговор".

languages.text: "...House Sauerback guilty. The head of your family has never tried to hide his attitude toward me. That is more than enough to convict him."
languages.original_text: "Род Зауэрбэк. Ваш глава никогда не скрывал своего отношения к моей персоне — вполне достаточно для обвинения".

traits.locale_text: "House Sauerback. The head of your family has never tried to hide his attitude towards me — that is a good enough basis for charges."
"House Sauerback. The head of your family has never tried to hide his attitude towards me — that is a good enough basis for charges."
"House Sauerback. The head of your family has never tried to hide his attitude toward me. That is a good enough basis to allege involvement."
"House Sauerback. The head of your family has never tried to hide his attitude toward me. That is a good enough basis to allege involvement."
"...House Sauerback guilty. The head of your family has never tried to hide his attitude toward me. That is more than enough to convict him."
"...House Sauerback guilty. The head of your family has never tried to hide his attitude toward me. That is more than enough to convict him."

languages.text: 「…ザウアーバック家は有罪だ。当主は私への態度を隠そうともしなかった。彼を有罪とするには十分すぎる理由だ」
languages.original_text: "...House Sauerback guilty. The head of your family has never tried to hide his attitude toward me. That is more than enough to convict him."

traits.locale_text: 「…ザウアーバック家は有罪だ。当主は私への態度を隠そうともしなかった。彼を有罪とするには十分すぎる理由だ」

languages.text: “……苏尔贝克家族有罪。你们的家族首领从不掩饰对我的轻蔑，这就足以给他定罪了。”
languages.original_text: "...House Sauerback guilty. The head of your family has never tried to hide his attitude toward me. That is more than enough to convict him."

traits.locale_text: “……苏尔贝克家族有罪。你们的家族首领从不掩饰对我的轻蔑，这就足以给他定罪了。”

languages.text: « ... la maison Sauerback coupable. Le patriarche de votre famille n'a jamais cherché à dissimuler le mépris que je lui inspire, et c'est un motif suffisant pour le condamner. »
languages.original_text: "...House Sauerback guilty. The head of your family has never tried to hide his attitude toward me. That is more than enough to convict him."

traits.locale_text: « ... la maison Sauerback coupable. Le patriarche de votre famille n'a jamais cherché à dissimuler le mépris que je lui inspire, et c'est un motif suffisant pour le condamner. »

languages.text: «... que la Casa Sauerback es culpable. Su cabeza de familia jamás ha intentado ocultar sus sentimientos hacia mí. Es más que suficiente para alegar su implicación».
languages.original_text: "...House Sauerback guilty. The head of your family has never tried to hide his attitude toward me. That is more than enough to convict him."

traits.locale_text: «... que la Casa Sauerback es culpable. Su cabeza de familia jamás ha intentado ocultar sus sentimientos hacia mí. Es más que suficiente para alegar su implicación».

languages.text: "... Haus Sauerback für schuldig. Das Oberhaupt Eurer Familie hat nie versucht, seine Abneigung mir gegenüber zu verbergen. Das ist mehr als genug, um ihn zu verurteilen."
languages.original_text: "...House Sauerback guilty. The head of your family has never tried to hide his attitude toward me. That is more than enough to convict him."

traits.locale_text: "Haus Sauerback. Der Kopf Eurer Familie hat nie versucht, seine Abneigung mir gegenüber zu verhehlen. Das reicht als Basis, um eine Beteiligung zu vermuten."

languages.text: "Sauerback Hanesi suçlu bulunmuştur. Hanenizin başı, bana karşı tavrını asla gizlemeye çalışmamıştır. Bundan başka delile gerek yoktur."
languages.original_text: "...House Sauerback guilty. The head of your family has never tried to hide his attitude toward me. That is more than enough to convict him."

traits.locale_text: "...Sauerback Hanesi suçlu bulunmuştur. Hanenizin önderi, bana karşı tavrını asla gizlemeye çalışmamıştır. Bundan başka delile gerek yoktur."

languages.translation_comment: хотя бы один из этих флагов или оба — ProvedWerserianInnocent и ZauerbackHatesYou
